lines: Your dad's boss thinks that you are a fine young man. He would be honored if you would consider escorting his lovely daughter Mathilda to the company dinner dance.

#TELL HIM YOU'LL GET BACK TO HIM

What kind of girl needs her father to make a date for her? You see your father's boss waiting outside the country club where they are staging the affair, with his mustachioed chauffeur. Wait a minute...That's not the
chauffeur, it's Mathilda! Eeeeeek! Your wildest dreams have come true, except they are nightmares!
The boss senses that you are trying to give him the runaround.
#LIE YOUR WAY OUT OF THE EXCUSE AND ACCEPT THE INVITATION
He doesn't get angry at all. Maybe it is just a coincidence that your dad has to sit on a stool, behind a plant, for the company affair.

This was a very open-minded set of choices. You arrive at the country club waiting to meet Dad's boss's daughter. All of a sudden, this MOVIE STAR walks up to you. Your eyes glaze...your mouth gets dry and you must concentrate
very hard to prevent your tongue from dropping out of your mouth. COULD THIS BE MATHILDA?

Nope. It's some lady who thinks you work there parking cars. Mathilda arrives complete with braces, pigtails and a squeaky laugh. As the night goes on, you find out she's not so bad. Dad gets a raise the following week. Now, about
Your behavior is rude and insensitive. Your boss reconsiders his earlier positive evaluation of you, and begins to wonder about your dad as well. You have caused the family considerable stress.

You must really hate your father. The boss' face becomes red. He takes a handful of high blood pressure medication (Hey, just like Dad says!). When he calms down, he promises that you will never have a job in his company.
Not only have you soured a potentially lucrative future business contact, you messed up the opportunity to date "Maddy," a blond-haired, blue-eyed knockout that would make your eyebrows twitch.
